subject: Medicine
title: AI-Designed Drugs
description: A quick win: understand AI-Designed Drugs.

hook.text: An AI designed a new drug molecule in 21 days that would have taken human chemists years. The race has started.

buildup.text: AI analyzes molecular structures, predicts binding affinity, and designs drug candidates from scratch.

discovery.text: Machine learning models trained on millions of known compounds can predict which new molecules will work.

punchline.text: AI accelerates discovery. Humans validate it.

quiz.question: What advantage does AI bring to drug development?
options: It dramatically speeds up the design phase of new drug molecules
It eliminates the need for all clinical trials
It can predict every side effect before human testing
